metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29479 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Ribose RNP before 0.16.3 may hang when the input is malformed.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-29479` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:102.10.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:102.10.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:102.10.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:102.10.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:102.10.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:102.10.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:102.10.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
